title: An actor-centered, scalable land system typology for addressing biodiversity loss in the world’s tropical dry woodlands
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Global Environmental Change, Volume 86

Author(s): Marie Pratzer, Patrick Meyfroidt, Marina Antongiovanni, Roxana Aragon, Germán Baldi, Stasiek Czaplicki Cabezas, Cristina A. de la Vega-Leinert, Shalini Dhyani, Jean-Christophe Diepart, Pedro David Fernandez, Stephen T. Garnett, Gregorio I. Gavier Pizarro, Tamanna Kalam, Pradeep Koulgi, Yann le Polain de Waroux, Sofia Marinaro, Matias Mastrangelo, Daniel Mueller, Robert Mueller, Ranjini Murali
